attributes.action: place speed limit signs on or alongside existing speed camera signs and speed cameras, to clarify what speed limit is currently in force.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On many roads, there are often more "Speed Camera" signs than signs depicting the current speed limit. 
Its very well knowing that there are cameras in place, but thats little use without knowing the speed limit also. Similarly for speed cameras. Whilst they are visible in yellow, they need to have a speed limit sign affixed the the mounting pole to remind road users of the current limit.
